Producer: Chris Clark, Tim Bevan, Eric Fellner, Rowan Atkinson, RaphaÃ«l Benoliel
Production Co: StudioCanal, Perfect World Pictures, Working Title Films
Synopsis: The new adventure begins when a cyberattack reveals the identities of all active undercover agents in Britain, leaving Johnny English as the secret service's last hope. Called out of retirement, English dives headfirst into action with the mission to find the mastermind hacker. As a man with few skills and analogue methods, Johnny English must overcome the challenges of modern technology to make this mission a success.
Title: Johnny English Strikes Again
